name: @odmd-rag/vector-storage-service
description: RAG Vector Storage Service - Stores embeddings in vector database for similarity search

scripts.cdk-ls: tsc --build && cross-env ODMD_build_id=ragVectorStorage ODMD_rev_ref=b..dev cdk ls --profile odmd-rag-ws1
scripts.cdk-ls-deps: tsc --build && cross-env ODMD_build_id=ragVectorStorage ODMD_rev_ref=b..dev cdk ls --show-dependencies --profile odmd-rag-ws1
scripts.cdk-synth: tsc --build && cross-env ODMD_build_id=ragVectorStorage ODMD_rev_ref=b..dev cdk synth --all --profile odmd-rag-ws1
scripts.cdk-deploy: tsc --build && cross-env ODMD_build_id=ragVectorStorage ODMD_rev_ref=b..dev cdk deploy ragVectorStorage--dev --no-rollback --profile odmd-rag-ws1

author: ODMD RAG Team
